# New Hope Baptist Church

Welcome to New Hope Baptist Church! We have been a pillar of the West End community for over 60 years.

Pastor Rev. Dr. James Thompson leads our congregation of over 500 members.

## About Us
New Hope Baptist Church was founded in 1963 during the Civil Rights movement. We continue to serve our community through various outreach programs.

## Services
- Sunday Morning Worship: 11:00 AM
- Wednesday Night Bible Study: 7:00 PM
- Friday Night Prayer Meeting: 7:00 PM

## Community Outreach
We believe in serving our neighbors. Our outreach programs include:
- Community meals
- Back-to-school supply drives
- Holiday toy drives

For more information, call the church office at (404) 555-0190.

**Address:** 200 Lee St SW, Atlanta, GA 30310
